attributes.action: Resist all attempts to desecrate Christmas by substituting it with "Winterval"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some councils and organisations are attempting to do away with Christmas for fear it will offend other cultures. They intend to substitute Christmas with a made-up and irrelevant festival known as "Winterval". This country has celebrated Christianity and related traditions and saints' days for hundreds of years. Our nation should retain its traditions and culture and resist any attempt to destroy them just to suit a minority.
